1: <pb/><t>Inkyxima'n mixti' kynab'l qa mixti'te Dyos:</t> <t>kykyaqil matxi' che b'aj kub' tzpet;</t> <t>taq'wixi'xju' nkyb'incha'n;</t> <t>¡mix-a'lo' jun nb'inchan b'a'n!</t>
2: <t>Inka'yintz Qman Dyos tzmax toj kya'j kyib'aju' xjal</t> <t>qa ate' junjun ati kynab'l,</t> <t>exqa nche jyon ti'j Dyos.</t>
3: <t>Aye'tzunkye xjal matxi' che b'ajx toju' b'e taq'wix;</t> <t>kykyaqilx matxi' che b'aj kub'tzpet.</t> <t>¡Mix-a'lo'tl jun nb'inchan b'a'n!</t> <t>¡K'i'xpe'wt jun!</t>
4: <pb/><t>Mixti'x kynab'lju' b'inchal il,</t> <t>aye' ate'qe'k kutz'ilkyeju' ntaname' naku'j wab'j kye,</t> <t>aye' mixti'x ntzaj kyna'n Qman Dyos.</t>
5: <t>Kche lu'lulkye' tu'n kyxob'il,</t> <t>qu'n atite Dyos kyuk'i'lju' nche okslan te.</t>
6: <t>Nche xmayin ti'j tb'is tk'u'ju' me's,</t> <t>atzunte Qman Dyos nklonte.</t>
7: <pb/><t>¡Naqwit tzaju' kolb'ilte Israel, <pb/>ti'ju' witz Syon!</t> <t>Aj tch'exb'ente Qman Dyos tchwinqlalju' ttanam,</t> <t>Che tzalajelju' tyajajil Jakob',</t> <t>tkyaqilju' tnam Israel, chiju' b'itzal.</t>
